title: Promptings or Me? Recognizing the Spirit's Voice [Paperback] Kevin Hinckley [Paperback] Kevin Hinckley [Paperback] Kevin Hinckley [Paperback] Kevin Hinckley [Paperback] Kevin Hinckley [Paperback] Kevin Hinckley [Paperback] Kevin Hinckley
description: Sometimes it seems impossible to find answers for life's important decisions. Even after praying, it can be difficult to discern the Spirit's voice from the other voices around us. Using his own special insights and his experience as a psychotherapist, Kevin Hinckley helps you answer the question we've all asked at one time or Is it a prompting, or is it just me?
author: Kevin Hinckley
